10A
Testamet̃n Iohn Combe Iuniore ꝑbat Ann Dmi 1561 : viij die May.
In the name of god Amen xiiijth day of Aprill yn the yere of
oꝛ lord god a thousand v. hundred lxi. I Iohn Combe of the yonger
of Burton yn the pyshe of Gyllinghã yn the dioces of Brayston
of ꝑfecte mynd & memory do make thys my laste wyll & Testa
met̃ yn mañ & forme folowyng : that ys to say fyrst I bequeath my
soule ynto the house of almyghty god & my body to be buryed
in the churche yeard of Gyllynghã afresayd. Itm̃ I gyve &
bequeath to Mar Martyn ffolyet my browne heafer. Itm̃ to
my brother Christmas I gyve a lytle bull of ij. yeres aige
Itm̃ to Katheryne Moger I gyve ij. chylver hoggs. Itm̃ to Iohn
Crew I gyve my medly coote. Itm̃ I gyve to my syster Isabell
Smyth a chylver hogg Itm̃ I gyve to Wyllyã Moger the elder
half an acre of wheate. Itm̃ I gyve to Agnis ffolyet one
chylver hogg Itm̃ I gyve to Agnis Chyld ij. chylver hoggs Itm̃
I gyve to the poꝛ mens boxe of Gyllynghã vjd Itm̃ to the
poꝛ mens boxe of Sylton vjd Itm̃ I gyve to Robert harper
iiijd And to habyter iiijd And to Rychard Poret iiijd
All the resydew of my goods not bequeathed as well moveable
as vnmoveable wͭ the lease of my house that I dwell yn
I gyve & bequeath to my wyf Mauld whom I make and
ordayne executrice of thys my wyll & testamet̃ And I make
& co̅stitute Stephen Moger overseer of the same Iohn fforward
ꝑson of Sylton Stephen Moger Iohn Crew & herry hopkins
wytnyssyng the ꝑmesse.
Also I the sayd Iohn Combe acknolege & co̅fesse that I gaue delyñed
to Wyllyã Cobyar a cow cowe of the legacie & bequest of hys
father delyñed yn the ꝑsence of Stephen Moger & Iohn Wyse
Itm̃ I gaue delyñed to Robert Tuamar of Tysbury of my
brother Christmas monay - xxS/, to the vse &
behaf of my sayd brother.
Itm̃ I owe to Iohn Whealar - vS/
Itm̃ I owe to the sayd ꝑson of Sylton for iij. weyght of
wooll savyng iiij. pounds p'ce of the weyght - xxiiijS/
Also I acknowlege & co̅fesse that my brother Thomas Combe
oweth me - viijS/
